::Prowl::

Prowl ducks as he sees Oblitertron's flame heading for him. He puts an arm 
around Iron Raptor's waist and jumps up, flapping his wings.

He clenches his teeth as the flame scorches his right leg, speeding up his 
flight so that the flame wouldn't touch Iron Raptor. He feels strangely 
excited as he holds her in his arms, remembering how he had held her in her 
quarters before the battle. His arms close protectively around her waist as 
he tries to clear his mind and concentrate on evading Oblitertron's attacks.
